name: RPS - Machine Learning
description:
This project is part of a research project of the final year of my Bachelor's degree. During your playthrough of this game, data will be anonymously collected on how you, the player, interacts with the user interface. Your data will be first used as the choices the bots will make against other players, and later used to train a Machine Learning model with the goal to predict a player's behavior based on that data.

By playing this game you are consenting to this anonymous data to be used for the previously mentioned purposes. If you are not comfortable with that, please don't participate in this experiment.

You'll be playing 5 opponents, first to 3 rounds won wins the match.

Controls

  • Keyboard: Arrow keys, Enter/Space
  • Xbox controller: Analog-stick, A
